DOC.brief_summary: The World Health Organisation warn influenza pandemic inevitable . The avian influenza H5N1 virus strain one lead candidate cause next influenza pandemic . The elderly likely special target group vaccination ; therefore , study test safety immunogenicity H5N1 pandemic influenza vaccine healthy elderly population .
DOC.brief_title: Study Pandemic Influenza Vaccine Elderly Participants
DOC.criteria: Healthy male female participant History clinically significant medical condition History GuillainBarre syndrome active neurological disease Resident nursing home longterm care facility
